pci_database_add_description1: Create a database available in your Public Cloud project. If you would like to use a private network that does not yet exist, please create
pci_database_add_step1_description: Select a database to suit your needs
pci_database_add_nodes_count_tooltip: The number of nodes depends on the solution you have chosen. In the beta test version, this number cannot be changed at the creation step.
pci_database_add_name_help_text: The name must include at least 3 characters
pci_database_add_privateNetwork_descript: By default, databases have a public network. You can also add a private network, but you will lose the configuration you have just set up.
pci_database_add_subnet_description: You can create a subnet, but you will lose your current configuration.
pci_database_add_create_database_success: Your database is being created, and will be available in a few minutes.
pci_database_add_create_database_error: An error has occurred creating your database. Please try the operation again later: {{message}}
